title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
description: A young boy discovers he's a wizard and attends Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
description: Harry's second year at Hogwarts as mysterious attacks terrorize the school.

title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
description: Harry learns about his past while a dangerous prisoner escapes from Azkaban.

title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
description: Harry competes in the dangerous Triwizard Tournament against his will.

title: Harry Potter and the Order of Phoenix
description: Harry forms Dumbledore's Army to fight against the dark forces rising.

title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
description: Harry learns about Voldemort's past while romance blooms at Hogwarts.

title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
description: Harry
column5: Ron and Hermione embark on a dangerous mission to destroy Horcruxes.

title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
description: The epic finale where the battle between good and evil reaches its climax.

title: The Avengers
description: Earth's mightiest heroes team up to stop Loki and his alien army.

title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
description: The Avengers battle Ultron
column5: an artificial intelligence bent on human extinction.

title: Avengers: Infinity War
description: The Avengers and their allies fight to stop Thanos from collecting all Infinity Stones.

title: Avengers: Endgame
description: The remaining Avengers travel through time to reverse Thanos' devastating actions.

title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
description: Peter Parker balances high school life with being Spider-Man.

title: Spider-Man: Far From Home
description: Peter goes on a European vacation but must fight mysterious creatures.

title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
description: Spider-Man's identity is revealed and he seeks help from Doctor Strange.

title: Black Panther
description: T'Challa returns to Wakanda to become king but faces a powerful challenger.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy
description: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior.

title: Doctor Strange
description: A former surgeon becomes the Sorcerer Supreme protecting Earth from magical threats.

title: The Lord of the Rings: Fellowship of the Ring
description: A young hobbit embarks on a journey to destroy a powerful ring.

title: The Lord of the Rings: Two Towers
description: The fellowship is broken while the war for Middle-earth begins.

title: The Lord of the Rings: Return of the King
description: The final battle for Middle-earth begins as Frodo reaches Mount Doom.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces the Joker
column5: a criminal mastermind who seeks to create chaos in Gotham.

title: Inception
description: A thief who steals corporate secrets using dream-sharing technology is given a final chance.

title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space to ensure humanity's survival.

title: Star Wars: A New Hope
description: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight to rescue Princess Leia from the Empire.

title: The Empire Strikes Back
description: After the rebels are overpowered by the Empire
column5: Luke begins Jedi training with Yoda.

title: Return of the Jedi
description: The rebels rescue Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt and face the Empire once more.

title: The Social Network
description: Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site Facebook.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson through the eyes of an Alabama man with IQ of 75.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years finding solace and eventual redemption.

title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his reluctant son.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of two mob hitmen
column6: and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in tales of violence.

title: Fight Club
description: An insomniac office worker forms an underground fight club that evolves into something much bigger.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
description: A young FBI cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated cannibal to catch another serial killer.

title: The Shining
description: A family heads to an isolated hotel where a sinister presence influences the father into violence.

title: Get Out
description: A young African-American visits his white girlfriend's parents for the weekend in this psychological horror.

title: La La Land
description: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles
column5: a pianist and an actress fall in love.

title: The Notebook
description: A poor yet passionate young man falls in love with a rich young woman in 1940s South Carolina.

title: Titanic
description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious Titanic.

title: Jurassic Park
description: A pragmatic paleontologist visits a theme park where dinosaurs are brought back to life.
